text: Kare wa (kotaete) itta. `Hitobito yo, kangaete mi nasai. Watashi ga omo kara no akashi no ue ni tachi, mata kare kara yoi o megumi o atae rarete iru (no ni,-nushi no keiji o tsutaeru koto o watashi ga okotarou ka). Mata anata gata ni kinjita koto o, in de okonau koto o nozomanai. Watashi no koi negau tokoro wa, tada-ryoku o tsukushite (yononaka o) kyōsei suru kotodeari, arrā ni yoru igai ni wa watashi no seikō 〔taufīku〕 wa nai nodearu. Watashi wa kare ni shinrai shi, kare ni kaigo shite kaeru
